article.title: GREMAS - A System for Classification and Documentation in Organic Chemistry
article.author: Fugmann, R.Brann, W.Vanpel, W.
article.text: The authors of this essay were faced with the task of organizing a documentation office in which a large number of publications and patents in chemistry would have to be processed. This large collection would be made available to a large group of elements without restrictions. To permit a large frequency of use, and to maintain this also with increases in file sizes, it becomes necessary to limit especially that faction of the task which consists in the retrieval activities paper. Savings in the retrieval activity are possible only at the expense of greater effort in indexing and by heavier use of technical aids. We have taken the second path by consciously applying the principles to a highly detailed faceted classification.
